title: Leadership Development for Women
description: A 6-week mentorship program aimed at enhancing leadership and strategic thinking skills for women professionals.

title: Tech Career Growth Mentorship
description: Focused mentorship sessions with senior women in tech guiding mid-level professionals on navigating career growth.

title: Return-to-Work Mentoring Circle
description: Designed for women re-entering the workforce after a career break, this program pairs participants with experienced mentors.
